sentences: This issue was considered in informal consultations facilitated by AWG-KP Chair Ashe.
Discussions focused on whether to establish a permanent forum to address potential consequences.
No agreement on this issue was reached, with some parties expressing reluctance to discuss the issue as it is being discussed under the AWG-LCA and a joint SBI/SBSTA contact group.
The AWG-KP plenary on 11 June agreed to further consultations at its next session.
